title: Introduction to shinyUHC
text: R package allows initialize UHC SALURBAL theme shiny apps.

title: Introduction to shinyUHC
text: install, load library initiate shiny app. theme shiny app template can found destination folder set. help bug report please submit issues onto repository! Happy coding ðŸ°!!
code: library(shinyUHC) ## Initialize a UHC themed Shiny app initializeShinyApp(dest = "./app", theme ="UHC") ## Initialize a SALURBAL themed Shiny app initializeShinyApp(dest = "./app", theme ="SALURBAL")

what: Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
title: Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
text: working make high level function initialize boilerplate shiny application certain features already included; now include branding loading page. future work add additional modules specified user. example addition boilerplate code sync-maps, sankeys ... type visualization previous already developed. hopefully allow open-sourcing high level shiny development making getting started Shiny easier. Right now two modules loaded: 1) generic ggplot histogram 2) sync-map component.

title: Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
text: dest path initialize app. Important: specify file name, just directory. './folder/app.R' wrong. './folder/' correct. folder created app.R file already initialized! theme theme want: Two options available "UHC" "SALURBAL"

title: Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
Initialize a themed shiny app â€” initializeShinyApp
code: initializeShinyApp(dest = "./demo", theme = "SALURBAL") #> App initialized at C:/Users/ranli/Desktop/Git local/UHC/shinyUHC/docs/reference/demo/app.R #> New app.R has been opened automatically.
